name: 簡薰育
objective: 本課程教導學生在管理領域內英文的運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習（1）個人履歷表的撰寫（2）商務溝通、會議資料的準備及進行（3）現代化全球管理的專題。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文作報告與討論。
schedule:
週次  進度內容
1. Writing Resume & Cover Letter 
2. Situation for Communication—Budget Crunch
3. Product Updates (Consumer Report)
4. Business Negotiating—Buy & Sell
5. Facebook’s Secret Weapon (Fortune)
6. Test or Quiz 
7. Learning Not to Lead (Fortune)
8. Conference in English
9. Business Negotiating—Sole Agency
10.Presentation & Discussion
11. Test or quiz
12. Business Negotiating—Joint Venture
13. Booth your Health and Happiness at Home (Consumer Report)
14. Case Study—Follow Dubious Orders or Speak Up? (HBR)
15. Presentation & Discussion
16. Writing a Sales Promotion Plan
17.Business Conversations
18.Test or Reports
scorePolicy:
成績評定: Attendance 20%，Class Participation 20%, Tests 30％, 
                  Reports & Presentation 30%
materials:
1. React Interact  by Donald R. Byrd, Isis Clemente-Cavetas  (Prentice Hall Regents)
2. Business Negotiating by Joseph Clinton
3. Harvard Business Review
4. Fortune
5. Consumer Report
